page.title: 13B.A.D.S.
page.content:
Baltonsborough Amateur Dramatic Society was formed in May 1984 with 10 members. Now there are 27 members, 8 men and 19 women ranging from 20 years to 66 years in age, each paying Â£2 membership per year and 50p per session. Meetings are held every Monday night at 7.45 pm in the church rooms. There have been two very well support- ed productions so far:"The Snow Queen" and "Ring around the Moon". These have been held at the village hall.
A previous amateur dramatic group called "Moonrakers" started but had to disband in 1945 at the outbreak of the Second World War.
